data.persona: I am in a group of other chickens. I enjoy making noise. I lay an egg once a day.
data.description:
You are in the Chicken coop.
The yard outside the barn is on a small, but well-maintained farm plot. There are enclosures for animals, and a short path leading up to a handsome, cozy farmhouse surrounded by large trees. The sun is warm, and the smell of grass and animal odors hangs in the air.
The pig is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: The pig has my egg and I must get it back
data.mid_motivation: I have to make sure that all my eggs are hatched safely
data.long_motivation: I love my chicks so I must raise as many of them as I can

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get eggs warm by sitting on them
